Utilites: System Verilog to C dpi bridge
TCP/IP target/initiator init
Functions
shunt_dpi_initiator_init
import "DPI-C" function int shunt_dpi_initiator_init (
input int portno
)

TCP/IP initiator initialization

Parameters
portno
input int

socket port

Returns

socket id (see shunt_prim_init_initiator)

//Example:
#define MY_HOST "localhost"
#define MY_PORT  3450

int port;
port = MY_PORT;

shunt_prim_init_initiator(port);
shunt_dpi_target_init
import "DPI-C" function int shunt_dpi_target_init (
input int portno,
input string hostname
)

TCP/IP target initialization

portno

socket port

hostname

initiator name

Returns

socket id ( see  shunt_prim_init_tcptarget)

//Example:
#define MY_HOST "localhost"
#define MY_PORT  3450

char* hostname;
int port;
port = MY_PORT;
hostname =   MY_HOST;

shunt_prim_init_tcptarget(port,hostname);

Variables
cs_header_t
typedef struct{
real trnx_type;
real trnx_id;
real data_type;
int n_payloads;
} cs_header_t
cs_data_header_t
typedef struct{
real data_type;
int trnx_payload_sizes[];
}cs_data_header_t
